title: Spirit
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Take-out, European, Dutch
description: Vegetarian cafe situated in the same complex as Gimsel health food supermarket. Renovated and expanded in summer 2012. Offers soups, salad bar, and choose your own ingredients for the wok fry.
streetAddress: De Groene Passage shopping centre, Mariniersweg 9
